doc.field: Shr N.A. vs N.A. Net 46,000 vs 106,000 Revs 19.8 mln vs 19.0 mln YEar Shr 26 cts vs 26 cts NEt 1.3 mln vs 1.3 mln Revs 82.1 mln vs 105.3 mln NOTE:1986 net includes 870,000 dlrs charge. 1985 net includes 788,000 credit. No share amounts provided for 4th qtr as NPS completed initial offering in August. Reuter
